p: Other 3CLpro inhibitors, such as Cinanserin [84], Flavonoids [85], Cobicistat [86], Atazanavir, Efavirenz, Ritonavir, Dolutegravir [87], Thymopentin, Carfilzomib, Saquinavir [88], Ledipasvir, and Velpatasvir [89] and PLP inhibitors, like Diarylheptanoids [90], Grazoprevir, Telaprevir, Boceprevir [91], Darunavir [92], and Formoterol chloroquine [93] are other potential approaches to combat SARS-CoV-2, but their efficacy remains to be tested.
